title: Can there be anything between conservatism and progressivism, such as progressive conservatism? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: A2A: There already is: Canadian conservative party used to be called Progressive Conservative Party for many years. The most progressive members call themselves fiscal conservatives; that basically means that they are against government deficit financing but they have no problem with any or most of the socially progressive stuff.

response.answer_text: Why not. Anything is a possibility as long as it is POSITIVE in order to be of benefit to the country. Maybe we are all progressive and conservative we need the best ideas, after considerable research, in order to get the best results and we can be cautiously optimistic which is the conservative part. If an idea does not work we need to try, try and try again.
